title: Denmark Gross Household Saving Rate
description: Household Saving Rate in Denmark decreased to 15.74 percent in the second quarter of 2022 from 22.52 percent in the first quarter of 2022. Personal Savings in Denmark averaged 7.85 percent from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 22.52 percent in the first quarter of 2022 and a record low of -2.95 percent in the fourth quarter of 2014. In Denmark, Personal Savings correspond to the total personal income saved during a certain period of time. This page provides - Denmark Personal Savings - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
